{{knowledge objective

|Title=Knowing epidemiology
|Description=None
|Rubric=Epidemiology
|Contributors=
|Order=2}}
The overall prevalence of spondyloarthritis in France is 0.35%.

Symptoms generally begin before the age of 45.

properties.question: What is the general age range for the onset of spondyloarthritis?
properties.option_c: The age range is not specified
properties.correct_option: The age range is not specified
